class.name: WiiMote
class.author: Edward A. Lee

input.name: rumble
input.description: Control to turn on or off the rumble feature.

class.documentation: This accessor gets accelerometer data from a Nintendo WiiMote. The accessor runs out of the box, but the server side requires some setup to publish the accelerometer readings to an online key-value store. There is a Ptolemy II model that will do this publishing, but it is not checked in to Ptolemy II SVN repository, because it includes GPLd code for the Bluetooth interface.
